title: Software Engineer – Virtual Mapping & Web Development (Volunteer)
description_text: About Us: LGS Tech is working on a mission-driven project that leverages virtual web technologies to make a real-world impact. Whether it’s for environmental conservation, disaster response, education, or community outreach, this is a unique opportunity to contribute your skills to a very good cause while building a compelling case study for your portfolio.
